seriesJson.title: Automation and technological change
seriesJson.description: Discussions of the implications of automation and technological change.

node.title: Social implications of automation
node.description: This program explores the possible effects of automation on society.

node.title: Some educational implications
node.description: This program explores the possible impact of technology on education.

node.title: Automation and employment
node.description: This program explores the effect that automation might have on employment.

node.title: The promise and challenge of technology
node.description: This program discusses "the challenge and promise of technology" and how changing technology might impact society.
